title: no mystery gift
body: I owned Riot Kayle, and I received the 10-year celebration icon today. Am I supposed to get an additional mystery box cus I already own Riot Kayle? I only got the icon, nothing else ?

replies.body: Per the announcement, players who already have Riot Kayle will instead get a mystery gift.  They are still being rolled out, and you may not get everything at the same time.  Stay up to date on our[ support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), as there's a lot of accounts to send out gifts to.  Let me know if you have any questions.

yes you will recieve the price of the skin as RP to your account or a mystery gift i am not sure, you can search and find the official post riot made but i am pretty sure its one of these 2

gl hf
